Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); PTOLEMAIC PERIOD ?; PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Fragments of the torso of a goddess or queen (?)
Description: The first side of this fragment from a sculptors model depicts the torso of a goddess or queen. The head is entirely missing, but the lower part of the large wig hangs down in curls on the right shoulder. On the breast is an unfinished collar. The right arm, developed up to the wrist, is ornamented with a lovely bracelet. The person wears a robe with feather decoration. The second side contains a fragment of torso and the left arm.
